item.title: This serious, dangerous patchwork of potholes has been reported many times: even reported as fixed! Croft st, which never was a problem has been resurfaced!, 25th May
item.description:
What three words Truly.orchestra.groups …All you need! Issue has been there for ? 2 ? Years don’t mess around with it again, just correct it properly, please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 48, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 25th May
item.description:
The drain located at a drop kerb pedestrian crossing on the corner of Clarence Road / Portland Street is blocked. After mild rainfall surface water is evident causing a hazard for pedestrians and wheel chair users alike.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 88, Portland Street, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same
